p: Our laboratory has investigated the expression and assembly of VLPs in plants and successfully produced several non-enveloped and enveloped VLPs including ones based on NVCP, HBV core antigen (HBcAg), and enveloped protein of West Nile virus [ 31]. VLP based on NVCP is one of the most investigated VLPs in plants and has been successfully expressed in many plant species including tobacco, potato, Nicotiana benthamiana, tomato, and lettuce by our group and collaborators [ 103, 129, 132, 133].
